sentences.en: ...the travels of Columbus, Magellan, and many other explorers.
sentences.cn: …哥伦布、麦哲伦和许多其他探险家的旅行。

sentences.en: But there is one explorer who is largely unknown outside of China.
sentences.cn: 不过却有一名探险家除中国人外,鲜少为人所知.

sentences.en: Sensing the explorer's lust for gold, the chief wisely presented gold ornaments as gifts.
sentences.cn: 酋长觉察出探险者们垂涎黄金的欲念, 就聪明地把金饰品作为礼物赠送给他们.

sentences.en: Some prevision warned the explorer of trouble.
sentences.cn: 某种预感警告探险者将有麻烦发生.

sentences.en: The animation, in this case, could have been built right into the main Explorer window.
sentences.cn: 在这种情况下, 动画可以直接建立在资源管理器的主窗口中.

sentences.en: The bank's responsibility is to verify that the explorer's documents conform to the letter of credit.
sentences.cn: 银行的责任在于查核出口商的单据必须与信用证的一致.

sentences.en: The explorer climbed a tree in order to orient himself.
sentences.cn: 探险家爬上树以认清方向.

sentences.en: The explorer climbed a tree in order to orientate himself.
sentences.cn: 那位勘探者为了确定他所在的地点爬到了一颗树上.
探险者叙述他的冒险经历.

sentences.en: The explorer spun many fantastic tales about his adventures in the primeval forests.
sentences.cn: 那探险家杜撰了许多他在原始森林里历险的离奇故事.

sentences.en: The explorer told fantastic stories of his adventures.
sentences.cn: 探险者讲了关于他几次冒险的离奇的故事.

sentences.en: The explorer told of his adventure with great circumstance.
sentences.cn: 探险者详细叙述了他的冒险经历.

sentences.en: The explorer was ever awake for the dangers that surrounded him.
sentences.cn: 这个探险家时刻提防着周围的危险.

sentences.en: The explorer was killed by barbaric people.
sentences.cn: 那位探险家被野蛮人杀死了.

sentences.en: Though Verrazano is by no means considered to be a great explorer, his name will probably remain immortal, for on Novenber 21 st , 1964, the greatest bridge in the world was named after him.
sentences.cn: 虽然维拉扎诺不能被认为是一位伟大的探险家, 但他的名字将有可能流芳百世, 因为在1964年11月21日, 一座世界上最大的桥梁以他的名字命名了.

phrases.tran_cn: 因特网浏览器；微软网页浏览器
服务器资源管理器；服务器总管
[计]解决方案资源管理器（设计数据库所用软件的菜单选项）

trans.tran_cn: 探险家，勘探者，探测器，[医]探针
trans.tran_en: someone who travels through an unknown area to find out about it
